review: OG burger is my favorite restaurant in kyiv since my Ukrainian friend brought me there on the beg of Oct 2021. The style, atmosphere, and of course the food are all great. As I visit there every time when I visit kyiv, I hope to come back very soon.
name: Aru Ma

review: Aru Ma, thank you for your feedback. Welcome to OG Burger
name: Valeriya Likhatska

review: I got myself a vegan burger ‚Äî all good , very traditional. A cozy, family place with laid back atmosphere. And some books, journals, and magazines to read through while waiting for food. ONLY BURGERS in menu
name: Serhii Vynnyk

review: Valeriya, thank you for your feedback. Welcome to OG Burger
name: cweretelnyk

review: Over any expectations
name: Thomas Chr√©tien

review: Super cool place with tasty food, excellent music, fun decor and amazing owners!  If you're looking for a variation on a burger and sweet potato fries in a punky/hipstery/lo-fi atmosphere with genuinely friendly people this place is a must.
name: Andrew Skorohod
